about_the_game:
Welcome to real-time strategy with elements of survival and tactical simulation. Ready to take command of your army? The strongest stickman armies of the world are waiting for you! Conquer the world and achieve great victories!




Take part for any country in World War II! Build the most powerful stickmen army of machine gunners, flamethrowers, cannons and tanks. Create your own history with your strategy and tactics in the WW2 real-time strategy game!



Great advantages of strategy games:

- Choice of different nations
- Epic special effects
- Wide range of military equipment
- Variety of missions and locations
- Nice graphics
- Many rewards and bonuses
- Unique abilities
- Great sound and music

Large selection of game modes Stickman ww2:
- Campaign. Pass exciting historical missions!
- Online mode. Fight with players from all over the world!
- Survival. Hold your defenses and don't let your enemies capture you!

Real World War II simulation with stickmen!

Defeat everyone to emerge victorious in real-time strategy!

name: Stickman WW2 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo 2.66GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 780
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Join the historic battles of World War II in the new game Stickman WW2
